clauses.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: WHILE ELLATION IS UNDER NO OBLIGATION TO DO SO, ELLATION RESERVES THE RIGHT TO REMOVE AND PERMANENTLY DELETE ANY CONTENT FROM THE SITE OR SERVICES WITHOUT NOTICE, AND FOR ANY REASON ELLATION DEEMS SUFFICIENT.

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: 'Ellation reserves the right in its sole discretion, at any time, to modify, discontinue or terminate the Site or Services or to modify or terminate these Terms of Use without advance notice.'

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: Comments can be blocked or censored for any reason
clauses.description: The service reserves the right, for any or no reason, to refuse to post or reject user communications.
clauses.clause_text: Ellation may, but is under no obligation to, monitor or censor Comments and disclaims any and all liability relating thereto.

case.text: User-generated content can be blocked or censored for any reason

clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: Without limiting other remedies, Ellation may at any time suspend or terminate your Crunchyroll account

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes (unless you opt out)
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text: You can opt out from being forced into binding arbitration, though: 'YOU MAY OPT-OUT OF THIS ARBITRATION AGREEMENT. If you do so, neither you nor Ellation can force the other to arbitrate. To opt-out, you must notify Ellation in writing no later than thirty (30) days after first becoming subject to this arbitration agreement. Your notice must include your name and address, and the email address you used to set up your Crunchyroll account (if you have one), and an unequivocal statement that you want to opt-out of this arbitration agreement. You must send your opt-out notice to one of the following physical or email addresses: Ellation, LLC., ATTN: Arbitration Opt-out, 444 Bush Street, San Francisco, CA 94108; legal@ellation.com.'

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: By continuing to use the Site or Services after Ellation has posted any modifications on the Site or provided any required notices, you accept and agree to be bound by the modifications.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: 'However, by uploading, posting, submitting or otherwise transmitting any User Submissions on or to the Site or Services, you hereby grant to Ellation a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, sublicensable, perpetual and irrevocable right and license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, prepare derivative works of, display, publish, perform and transmit your User Submissions in connection with the Services and Ellation's (and its successors) business including, without limitation, for promotion and redistributing part or all of the Services (and derivative works thereof), in any media formats and through any media channels.'

case.text: Your content can be licensed to third parties

clauses.title: You waive your right to a class action (unless you opt out)
clauses.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.
clauses.clause_text: You can opt out from being waived from the right to a class action, though: 'YOU MAY OPT-OUT OF THIS ARBITRATION AGREEMENT. If you do so, neither you nor Ellation can force the other to arbitrate. To opt-out, you must notify Ellation in writing no later than thirty (30) days after first becoming subject to this arbitration agreement. Your notice must include your name and address, and the email address you used to set up your Crunchyroll account (if you have one), and an unequivocal statement that you want to opt-out of this arbitration agreement. You must send your opt-out notice to one of the following physical or email addresses: Ellation, LLC., ATTN: Arbitration Opt-out, 444 Bush Street, San Francisco, CA 94108; legal@ellation.com.'

case.text: You waive your right to a class action.

clauses.title: A license is kept on user-generated content even after you close your account
clauses.description: The service may still use your content and display it after you stopped using it by closing your account. The case applies to terms requiring users to grant them a perpetual license over that content.
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: 'However, by uploading, posting, submitting or otherwise transmitting any User Submissions on or to the Site or Services, you hereby grant to Ellation a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, sublicensable, perpetual and irrevocable right and license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, prepare derivative works of, display, publish, perform and transmit your User Submissions in connection with the Services and Ellation's (and its successors) business including, without limitation, for promotion and redistributing part or all of the Services (and derivative works thereof), in any media formats and through any media channels.'

case.text: A license is kept on user-generated content even after you close your account

clauses.title: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions
clauses.clause_text:
Opt-out instructions are also mentioned elsewhere on section 4. Although you may not be able to opt-out from tracking on console and mobile apps ('Depending on which device you are using, you may be able to opt out or remove these cookies from the device' at 'PlayStation, Apple iOS, Android Devices, and Other Connected Devices'). Section 4 mentions also that tracking technologies may be used by third parties.

clauses.clause_text: You agree to immediately notify Ellation of any unauthorized use of your username, password or Crunchyroll account.

case.text: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: Ellation does not have any obligation to monitor the User Submissions that is uploaded, posted, submitted or otherwise transmitted using the Site or Services, for any purpose and, as a result, is not responsible for the accuracy, completeness, appropriateness, legality or applicability of the User Submissions or anything said, depicted or written by Crunchyroll Members, including, without limitation, any information obtained by using the Site or Services.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: The Site and Services may be used and accessed for lawful purposes only.

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text:
You are responsible for safeguarding and maintaining the confidentiality of your username, password and corresponding Crunchyroll account information.
You agree not to disclose your password to anyone.
You agree that you are entirely and solely responsible for any and all activities or actions that occur under your Crunchyroll account, whether or not you have authorized such activities or actions.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: In the event that any provision in these Terms of Use is held to be invalid or unenforceable, the unenforceable part will be given effect to the greatest extent permitted by law and the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect to the maximum extent permitted by law.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
clauses.description: You are responsible for the interactions and the disputes that may occur with other users of the Service. In the event of a dispute, you release the Service from all claims resulting from it.
clauses.clause_text: You are solely responsible for your interactions (including any disputes) with other Crunchyroll Users.

case.text: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in the State of California
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: These Terms of Use will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of California excluding that body of law pertaining to conflict of laws.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
